channel.title: Homes on Wei Peng's Academic Site
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Wei Peng's Academic Site

item.description: Career Highlight I am a pioneering AI expert with over 15 years of experience in driving AI research, innovation, and commercialization in Fortune 100 companies and leading research institutions. I am dedicated to advancing AI development, shaping strategic technology directions, and integrating AI solutions into commercial products. Recent Posts As a Principal Research Fellow at School of Engineering, RMIT University, I lead industrial AI innovation, bridging the gap between research and real-world applications.
